markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Archer Sentry](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3552)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Archer sentries slightly outrank rank-and-file guards, taking positions on walls, garrisons, and other important locations where they can stay out of the fray and pick off criminals or assailants.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Archer_Sentry.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Archer Sentry](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3552)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 111

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +4, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Composite Longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74) (100 arrows), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), [Signal Whistle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=50)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +10 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Sentry's Aim** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The archer sentry aims carefully and fires. They make a ranged weapon Strike with a +1 circumstance bonus. The Strike ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition, [lesser cover, and standard cover, and reduces greater cover to standard cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-545" />
name: Archer Sentry

text: Archer Sentry Archer sentries slightly outrank rank-and-file guards, taking positions on walls, garrisons, and other important locations where they can stay out of the fray and pick off criminals or assailants. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 16 Unspecific Lore : DC 14 Specific Lore : DC 11 Archer Sentry Source NPC Core pg. 111 Perception +11 Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +8, Athletics +6, Intimidation +4, Legal Lore +4 Str +2 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +0 Items Composite Longbow (100 arrows), Leather Armor, Shortsword, Signal Whistle --- AC 17 Fort +7 Ref +10 Will +7 HP 30 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action shortsword +10 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d6+4 piercing Melee Single Action fist +10 (Agile, Finesse, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+4 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action composite longbow +10 (deadly d10, Propulsive, range increment 100 feet, reload 0, volley 30 feet), Damage 1d8+3 piercing Sentry's Aim Two Actions (Concentrate) The archer sentry aims carefully and fires. They make a ranged weapon Strike with a +1 circumstance bonus. The Strike ignores the concealed condition, lesser cover, and standard cover, and reduces greater cover to standard cover.
